precondition: The mouse cursor is visible on the Windows XP desktop.
action: Right Click on the desktop and Click the menu item 'Properties'.

precondition: The desktop context menu with the title 'Arrange Icons By' is visible.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Appearance" tab is selected.
action: Click and drag the mouse from the "Appearance" tab to the "Themes" tab.
expected_results: The "Themes" tab will become selected, displaying the options for changing the Windows theme.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. The preview window will show a blank screen with the text "Windows XP". Options for selecting a screen saver, setting the wait time, and configuring power settings will become available.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will expand, revealing a list of available screen saver options.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'Power...' button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Apply" button is active.
expected_results: The changes made in the "Screen Saver" tab will be applied.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is visible at the bottom of the window, within the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off hard disks" option should be set to "After 20 mins".
action: Click the dropdown button for the "Turn off hard disks" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time options for turning off the hard disks.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close. The "Turn off hard disks" value will update to "After 5 hours".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open, showing the "Screen Saver" tab.
